segments.text: I notice the woman in the apron, so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is filling up fast with running water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing now, water cascading over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is spreading across the floor towards her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, her face completely calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, a boy is on a stool by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to get into the cookie jar, looking determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is tilting backward dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll come crashing down with cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm up, waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in this little heist, so innocent yet risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside seems so safe compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to those kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
